chunks.title: Introduction to English Language
chunks.content: This lesson introduces Arabic speakers to the English language. Learn basic greetings, common phrases, and essential vocabulary. The lesson covers fundamental concepts that will serve as building blocks for your English learning journey. Duration: 10 minutes. Level: Beginner.

chunks.title: English Alphabet Learning
chunks.content: Master the English alphabet with proper pronunciation. This lesson covers all 26 letters (A-Z) with phonetic examples and Arabic pronunciation guides. Practice writing both capital and small letters. Learn letter sounds and common words that start with each letter. Duration: 30 minutes.

chunks.title: Interactive Alphabet Practice
chunks.content: Interactive exercises to reinforce alphabet learning. Practice pronunciation with audio examples, complete letter matching games, and test your knowledge with quizzes. This flexible lesson adapts to your learning pace and provides immediate feedback on your progress.

chunks.title: Matching Game: Basics
chunks.content: Fun matching game to learn basic English concepts. Match Arabic words with their English equivalents, practice vocabulary through visual connections, and build your word bank. This game-based approach makes learning engaging and memorable.

chunks.title: Numbers and Colors Vocabulary
chunks.content: Learn English numbers from 1-100 and basic colors. Practice counting, learn color names, and combine numbers with colors in simple sentences. This lesson builds essential vocabulary for daily communication and provides practical examples.

chunks.title: Interactive Letters Game
chunks.content: Advanced letter recognition game with interactive elements. Practice letter formation, sound recognition, and word building. This game adapts to your skill level and provides progressive challenges to enhance your alphabet mastery.

chunks.title: Family and Favorite Things
chunks.content: Learn family vocabulary: mother, father, sister, brother, grandparents. Practice describing favorite objects, foods, and activities. Build sentences about family members and their preferences. Duration: 25 minutes. Essential for daily conversations.

chunks.title: Names Matching Game
chunks.content: Practice matching Arabic names with English equivalents. Learn common English names and their pronunciations. This game helps build cultural understanding and improves name recognition skills for better communication.

chunks.title: Nouns: Types and Forms
chunks.content: Understand different types of nouns: common nouns, proper nouns, countable and uncountable nouns. Learn noun forms and how they change in sentences. Practice identifying nouns in context. Duration: 25 minutes. Foundation for grammar.

chunks.title: Capitalization Rules
chunks.content: Learn when to use capital letters: beginning of sentences, proper nouns, titles, days, months, countries. Practice capitalization in writing exercises. Understand the importance of proper capitalization in English. Duration: 30 minutes.

chunks.title: Pronouns in English
chunks.content: Master English pronouns: personal pronouns (I, you, he, she, it, we, they), possessive pronouns (my, your, his, her, its, our, their), and reflexive pronouns (myself, yourself, himself, herself, itself, ourselves, themselves). Duration: 50 minutes.

chunks.title: Present Simple Tense
chunks.content: Learn present simple tense for habits, routines, and general truths. Understand subject-verb agreement, negative forms, and question formation. Practice with daily activities and common verbs. Duration: 40 minutes. Essential tense for beginners.

chunks.title: Descriptive Adjectives
chunks.content: Learn descriptive adjectives for people, places, and things. Practice adjective placement in sentences, comparative forms, and common adjective patterns. Build vocabulary for better descriptions. Duration: 15 minutes.

chunks.title: Past Tense Verbs Game
chunks.content: Interactive game to practice past tense verbs. Learn regular and irregular past forms, practice verb conjugation, and build sentence structures. This game makes learning past tense engaging and memorable.

chunks.title: Spatial Prepositions
chunks.content: Master spatial prepositions: in, on, at, under, over, behind, in front of, between, among, through. Learn when and how to use each preposition correctly. Practice with location descriptions and directions. Duration: 20 minutes.

chunks.title: Articles A and An
chunks.content: Learn when to use articles 'a' and 'an'. Understand vowel and consonant rules, practice with nouns, and learn common article patterns. Essential for proper English sentence structure. Duration: 15 minutes.

chunks.title: Collective Nouns
chunks.content: Learn collective nouns for groups: family, team, class, audience, committee, staff, crew, herd, flock, pack. Practice using collective nouns in sentences and understand subject-verb agreement. Duration: 20 minutes.

chunks.title: Adjectives and Adverbs Game
chunks.content: Interactive matching game for adjectives and adverbs. Learn the difference between adjectives and adverbs, practice their usage in sentences, and build vocabulary for better descriptions.

chunks.title: Basic Questions Formation
chunks.content: Learn to form basic questions using question words: what, where, when, who, why, how. Practice question structure, intonation, and common question patterns. Essential for daily communication. Duration: 15 minutes.

chunks.title: Interactive Questions Story
chunks.content: Interactive story to practice question formation. Learn to ask and answer questions in context, practice question-answer patterns, and build conversational skills through storytelling.

chunks.title: Basic Survival Vocabulary
chunks.content: Essential vocabulary for basic survival situations: help, emergency, hospital, police, fire, water, food, shelter, phone, money. Learn phrases for asking for help and basic communication. Duration: 10 minutes.

chunks.title: Present Simple Review
chunks.content: Comprehensive review of present simple tense. Practice all forms: positive, negative, questions. Review subject-verb agreement and common usage patterns. Reinforce learning through exercises. Duration: 15 minutes.

chunks.title: Present Continuous Tense
chunks.content: Learn present continuous tense for actions happening now. Understand verb + ing formation, negative forms, and question structure. Practice with current activities and temporary situations. Duration: 15 minutes.

chunks.title: Present Tenses Story
chunks.content: Interactive story comparing present simple and continuous tenses. Learn when to use each tense, practice in context, and understand the differences through storytelling and examples.

chunks.title: Past Simple with Common Verbs
chunks.content: Master past simple tense with common verbs: go, come, see, eat, drink, sleep, work, study, play, watch. Learn regular and irregular past forms. Practice in sentences and conversations. Duration: 20 minutes.

chunks.title: Future with Will and Going To
chunks.content: Learn future tense using 'will' for predictions and 'going to' for plans. Understand the differences, practice formation, and use in context. Essential for talking about future events. Duration: 20 minutes.

chunks.title: Future Plans Story
chunks.content: Interactive story about future plans and predictions. Practice using will and going to in context, learn to express intentions, and build confidence in future tense usage.

chunks.title: Basic Adjectives and Adverbs
chunks.content: Learn basic adjectives and adverbs for describing people, places, and actions. Practice adjective-adverb formation, placement in sentences, and common usage patterns. Duration: 15 minutes.

chunks.title: Prepositions Review
chunks.content: Comprehensive review of all prepositions learned: time, place, movement, and spatial prepositions. Practice usage in context, common phrases, and avoid common mistakes. Duration: 15 minutes.

chunks.title: Vocabulary Expansion
chunks.content: Expand your vocabulary with synonyms, antonyms, and related words. Learn word families, build connections between words, and increase your English word bank. Duration: 20 minutes.

chunks.title: World of Words Story
chunks.content: Interactive story exploring a world of words. Learn new vocabulary in context, practice word usage, and discover how words connect to create meaning in stories and conversations.

chunks.title: Forming Questions
chunks.content: Advanced question formation techniques. Learn different question types, practice question tags, and understand question intonation patterns. Build confidence in asking questions. Duration: 20 minutes.

chunks.title: Listening and Reading Skills
chunks.content: Develop listening and reading comprehension skills. Practice understanding spoken English, reading simple texts, and building comprehension strategies. Essential for real-world communication.

chunks.title: Comprehensive Nouns Review
chunks.content: Complete review of all noun types: common, proper, countable, uncountable, collective, and abstract nouns. Practice identification, usage, and common patterns. Duration: 15 minutes.

chunks.title: Comprehensive Pronouns Review
chunks.content: Complete review of all pronoun types: personal, possessive, reflexive, demonstrative, and relative pronouns. Practice usage, agreement, and common patterns. Duration: 15 minutes.

chunks.title: Introduction to Verbs
chunks.content: Learn about verbs as action words. Understand verb types: action verbs, linking verbs, and helping verbs. Practice verb identification and basic conjugation. Duration: 15 minutes.

chunks.title: Auxiliary Verbs Do, Be, Have
chunks.content: Master auxiliary verbs: do (for questions/negatives), be (for continuous tenses), have (for perfect tenses). Learn their forms and usage patterns. Essential for English grammar. Duration: 20 minutes.

chunks.title: Short Answers
chunks.content: Learn to give short answers in English conversations. Practice yes/no responses with auxiliary verbs, avoid one-word answers, and sound more natural in English. Duration: 15 minutes.

chunks.title: Word Formation: Prefixes
chunks.content: Learn common English prefixes: un-, re-, pre-, dis-, mis-, in-, im-, il-, ir-. Understand how prefixes change word meanings and practice building new words. Duration: 20 minutes.

chunks.title: Word Formation: Suffixes
chunks.content: Learn common English suffixes: -tion, -sion, -ment, -ness, -ful, -less, -able, -ible, -ly, -er, -est. Understand how suffixes change word forms and practice word building. Duration: 20 minutes.

chunks.title: Social Expressions: Greetings and Farewells
chunks.content: Learn common greetings: Hello, Hi, Good morning, Good afternoon, Good evening, Goodbye, See you later, Take care. Practice formal and informal expressions. Duration: 15 minutes.

chunks.title: Social Expressions: Thanks and Apologies
chunks.content: Learn expressions for thanks: Thank you, Thanks, Thank you very much, I appreciate it. Apologies: I'm sorry, Excuse me, I apologize, My apologies. Practice in context. Duration: 15 minutes.

chunks.title: Past Continuous Tense
chunks.content: Learn past continuous tense for actions in progress in the past. Understand was/were + verb + ing formation, negative forms, and question structure. Practice with interrupted actions. Duration: 20 minutes.

chunks.title: Past Simple vs Past Continuous
chunks.content: Compare and contrast past simple and past continuous tenses. Learn when to use each tense, practice in context, and understand the differences through examples and exercises. Duration: 25 minutes.

chunks.title: Unit 1 Comprehensive Test
chunks.content: Complete assessment covering all Unit 1 material: alphabet, basic vocabulary, simple grammar concepts, and fundamental communication skills. Test your knowledge and identify areas for improvement. Duration: 30 minutes.

chunks.title: Gemini TADD AI Experience
chunks.content: Experience AI-powered learning with Gemini TADD. Practice conversation, get instant feedback, and enhance your English skills through interactive AI tutoring. This flexible lesson adapts to your needs.
